hero.name: SathiEliza
hero.title: Digital Marketing Expert & Growth Hacker
hero.description: I help businesses thrive in the digital age. Using data-driven strategies and creative campaigns to connect your brand with the right audience.

about.text: Over the past 5 years, I've worked with diverse clients globally. My primary focus is to maximize your Return on Investment (ROI) through performance-driven marketing strategies that actually move the needle.
about.usp: I don't just run ads; I build high-converting ecosystems that turn clicks into loyal customers using advanced psychological triggers and data-backed insights.

testimonials.name: Sarah Jenkins
testimonials.feedback: Tanvir completely transformed our online presence. Our conversion rate tripled within three months of working with him! His approach to data is truly unique.

testimonials.name: Mark Thompson
testimonials.feedback: The level of insight provided through the analytics dashboards was a game-changer for our quarterly planning. We finally know where our money goes.

testimonials.name: Elena Rodriguez
testimonials.feedback: Strategic, professional, and results-oriented. The lead generation campaign surpassed all our expectations. Tanvir is a true partner in our growth.
